Congratulations to @AdyBarkan and @rachael_scar, and welcome to the world, Willow. She is named for my grandfather William and one of our heroes, the great singer and activist Nina Simone. Oficialmente no se registran heridos.

We’re unveiling our FIRST-ever Green New Deal infrastructure bill!👷🏽‍♀️🌎

The GND for Public Housing Act will:
🏙 Decarbonize the entire US public housing stock
👨‍👨‍👧‍👦 Improve quality of life for residents

RT @nhannahjones This framing really is problematic and is emblematic of a deep need for a reset in political reporting. An impeachment inquiry is not a game nor is it entertainment. It is a very serious matter with severe consequences for our democratic republic. https://twitter.com/jeffmason1/status/1194805959627018240 QT @jeffmason1 Consequential, but dull: Trump impeachment hearings begin without a bang https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trump-impeachment-response/consequential-but-dull-trump-impeachment-hearings-begin-without-a-bang-idUSKBN1XO059

Our team has been working on the Green New Deal for Public Housing for months, engaging residents & experts.

It takes principles of the GND & creates economic stimulus for working people to decarbonize & center frontline communities.

Read about it:
https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2019/11/13/ocasio-cortez-sanders-pitch-green-new-deal-bill-public-housing/

RT @sunrisemvmt Our leaders have neglected + forgotten public housing for decades.

Millions are forced to choose between living in homes with toxic mold and unreliable heat, or sleeping on the street.

That's why we need @AOC + @SenSanders' Public Housing #GreenNewDeal.

https://www.nydailynews.com/opinion/ny-oped-public-housing-needs-its-own-green-new-deal-20191114-b3aliheyqvc6ll425rcb7tg5cq-story.html

They’re terrified. And we need to act.

Let us not forget: Climate change is the existential crisis of our time. Tens of thousands of Americans get criminal records every year for marijuana possession.
